name: Stains of Regret
description:
Stains of Regret is a short 2D horror experience following the story of a father looking for his daughter. Follow his journey learning more about the world and its characters as you attempt to find your daughter, all whilst having to face unspeakable horrors and personal demons.

Please note, this is a prototype and still requires a lot of work. As a result, some elements may be unfinished and the game uses royalty free sound effects. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated!
